items.question: How can I reduce unplanned downtime at my plant?
items.answer: Tractian condition monitoring detects early-stage failures and sends alerts before breakdowns happen - giving you time to act. Combined with our CMMS, those alerts automatically generate work orders, assign tasks, and track progress, so nothing slips through the cracks. You prevent failures and stay organized while doing it.

items.question: Can I prove ROI using Tractian?
items.answer: Yes. Tractian tracks every avoided failure, reduced downtime event, and cost saving automatically. You get clear reports showing the financial impact of your maintenance operations - making it easy to justify investment and demonstrate results to leadership.

items.question: How hard is it to install and start using Tractian?
items.answer: Not hard at all. Our sensors are wireless and install in minutes without stopping production. The software is intuitive and browser-based. Plus, our team handles onboarding, training, and setup - so your team is up and running fast.

items.question: Can Tractian really help if my team is understaffed?
items.answer: Absolutely. Tractian automates work order creation, prioritizes tasks, and gives technicians step-by-step guidance. This means your team spends less time figuring out what to do and more time doing it - even with fewer people.

items.question: Do I need to replace my current systems to use Tractian?
items.answer: No. Tractian integrates with ERPs like SAP, Oracle, and other systems. You can keep your current tools and use Tractian alongside them, or gradually transition at your own pace.

items.question: How does Tractian support compliance and audit preparation?
items.answer: Every task, inspection, and procedure is automatically logged with timestamps and user details. You can instantly export records for audits, safety reviews, and compliance checks - no manual paperwork needed.

items.question: What kind of reporting does Tractian offer?
items.answer: Tractian offers customizable dashboards and reports covering KPIs, downtime analysis, maintenance costs, team performance, and asset health. Reports can be filtered by site, team, asset, or time period and exported for stakeholders.

items.question: Is Tractian easy for technicians to use?
items.answer: Yes. The mobile app is designed for the shop floor - simple, fast, and intuitive. Technicians get step-by-step instructions, can log work with a few taps, and don't need extensive training to get started.

items.question: What kind of support is included with Tractian?
items.answer: Every Tractian customer gets white-glove support: dedicated onboarding, field training, and ongoing technical assistance. We're on-site when it matters and always available for questions.

items.question: Can I use Tractian across multiple sites?
items.answer: Yes. Tractian is built for multi-site operations. You get a unified view of all your plants, can compare performance across locations, and standardize processes company-wide.

items.question: What types of machines or equipment does Tractian work with?
items.answer: Tractian works with virtually any rotating or industrial equipment - motors, pumps, compressors, fans, conveyors, and more. Our sensors and software adapt to your specific asset types and operating conditions.

items.question: Does Tractian require Wi-Fi or internal networks?
items.answer: Our sensors use their own communication protocol and don't depend on your plant's Wi-Fi. The gateway connects to the internet via Ethernet or cellular, so you don't need to change your network infrastructure.

items.question: Can Tractian help with standardizing processes across teams?
items.answer: Yes. With SOPs, checklists, and guided work orders built into the platform, every team member follows the same procedures. This ensures consistency, reduces errors, and makes training faster.

items.question: Can I migrate my existing maintenance data?
items.answer: Yes. Our team helps you migrate historical data from spreadsheets, legacy CMMS, or other systems so you don't lose any context or history when switching to Tractian.

items.question: Does Tractian integrate with my existing tools?
items.answer: Tractian integrates with major ERPs (SAP, Oracle NetSuite), BI tools (Power BI), and other enterprise systems. We also offer an open API for custom integrations.

items.question: Is Tractian secure?
items.answer: Yes. Tractian is SOC 2 compliant, ISO 27001 certified, and uses enterprise-grade encryption. Your data is stored securely in the cloud with strict access controls and regular security audits.

items.question: How much does Tractian cost?
items.answer: Pricing depends on your operation size, number of assets, and which solutions you need. Contact us for a customized quote - we'll build a plan that fits your budget and goals.
